definition: to shut down/to terminate/to cancel/to go out of business
to stop/to halt/to park (a car)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: After a five-year hiatus, the Billboard Music Awards officially returned in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 經過5年的停辦，美國公告牌音樂獎重回熒屏。

sentences.english: Others say censorship is the real reason for the show's cancelation.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些人認爲停辦此節目的真兇是“審查制度”。

sentences.english: They said that if we entered again they would stop having the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 他們說如果我再來參賽，他們乾脆就停辦比賽。

sentences.english: Unless given more financial assistance, the school will have to close.
sentences.chinese: 如果得不到更多財政援助，學校就得停辦。

sentences.english: In A. D. 394 the Roman emperor Theodosius I ordered them stopped.
sentences.chinese: 公元394年，羅馬皇帝蒂奧多西斯下詔停辦奧運會。

sentences.english: The school suspended for lack of finances.
sentences.chinese: 那所學校因經費不足而暫時停辦。

sentences.english: Train service will be suspended from midnight to 4 a. m. to permit repairs.
sentences.chinese: 火車服務從午夜到清晨4點停辦，以便修護。

definition: Korean War (1950-1953)
abbr. for 聯合國大會|联合国大会[Lian2 he2 guo2 Da4 hui4], United Nations General Assembly/abbr. for 國立西南聯合大學|国立西南联合大学[Guo2 li4 Xi1 nan2 Lian2 he2 Da4 xue2], National Southwest Combined University
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
Manchukuo
first organized/to run sth for the first time
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Korean War (1950-1953)
to repeal (a law)/to put an end to/abolition/annulled
Treaty of Shimonoseki (1895), concluding the First Sino-Japanese War 甲午戰爭|甲午战争[Jia3 wu3 Zhan4 zheng1]
Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
to look back at history
Tainan county in south Taiwan
Scout (youth organization)
child soldiers/juvenile militia
military coup
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
to buy out/buyout/severance
